resources.name: Athena School of Arms
resources.description: A local HEMA school focusing on German Longsword with rotating classes on other weapons including Italian Rapier and Highland Broadsword

resources.name: Tattershall School of Defense
resources.description: Tattershall School of Defence offers a varied online swordplay curriculum.

resources.name: Justin Aucoin
resources.description: Justin Aucoin offers both recorded video classes/content and teaches online classes twice a week on Mondays and Thursdays

resources.name: Valkyrie WMA
resources.description: Valkyrie Martial Arts offers private training and classes covering a variety of weapons and styles with a focus on body mechanics, exploration and inclusivity.  Due to the pandemic all classes are currently online, and online instruction is planned to continue after in person training can resume.
